Thaddhamacchariyasadisañhi kucchitaṃ sabbadā nihīnaṃ natthi sabbaguṇānaṃ ādibhūtassa bhogasampattiādisabbasampattīnaṃ mūlabhūtassa dānassa nisedhanato. Tenāha ‘‘kadariyāti thaddhamaccharino’’ti. Ekacco hi attano vasanaṭṭhāne bhikkhū hatthaṃ pasāretvāpi na vandati. innerText: 57-60. Sattame āyubhāgapaṭilābhinī hotīti āyukoṭṭhāsassa paṭilābhinī hoti. Tividhalokanti sattasaṅkhārabhājanasaṅkhātaṃ tividhaṃ lokaṃ. Viditaṃ katvāti vibhūtaṃ katvā. Lokavidūnanti karaṇatthe sāmivacananti āha ‘‘buddhehi pasatthā’’ti. Aṭṭhamanavamadasamāni uttānatthāneva.
